c74object.name: byte-cast
c74object.digest: For casting a list of byte dat
c74object.description: Max Object to cast a list of byte data such as that received from Arduino serial comms or Bluetooth Low Energy devices

objarg.name: format
objarg.description:
The number of arguments determines the number of outlets. Each outlet decodes a list of bytes as either 16-bit 32-bit signed or unsigned int, 32-bit or 64-bit float or symbol.
Decoding method is identified by symbol arguments (h, i, f, or s) similar to C format strings.
Modifiers can be used to dictate endianess ('<' little, `>` big) and signing ('u' for unsigned). e.g. `uh>` is an unsigned 16-bit int in big-endian order.
